original_title: Sri Lanka’s CPC to lease emergency response vessel
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s state-run Ceylon Petroleum Corporation will lease a maintenance emergency response vessel, cabinet spokesman Minister Bandula Gunawardana said.
The cabinet of ministers had approved the leasing of the vessel from Sri Lanka Shipping Company Limited.
Ceylon Petroleum Corporation imports fuel and operates off shore mooring points and pipelines.  (Colombo/May17/2023)
